Early into the new year, and some of us are already buried in W-2s, 1099s, receipts, and other tax documentation. In between figuring out deductions, deadlines creeping closer, and inflation driving up prices on everything from groceries to utilities, there's hardly room in the budget for personal treats.

Luckily, AT&T Prepaid wants to rescue you. The mobile carrier is running tax season deals from now until April 17. The purpose is to help customers upgrade to the latest smartphones without overspending. Enrol in an eligible monthly plan starting at $30 per month with AutoPay, and you can walk away with a Motorola Moto G Play 2024, AT&T Motivate Pro 5G, or even an iPhone.

AT&T Tax Time offers are Prepaid & in-store only

If you're looking to get a new phone, AT&T’s tax time smartphone promotion may just be what you need. Sign up for any monthly plan starting at $30 per month with AutoPay, and you can get a new phone for free or with great discounts. For many carriers, including AT&T, using AutoPay quickens and simplifies the payment process. You don’t have to worry about missing due dates. 

The Unlimited Basic, Unlimited Max, and the new Unlimited Level Up plans are examples of eligible plans with support for the automated feature. The offer is available only in-store, and you won't find it on the carrier's website. You'll need to visit a nearby AT&T store where you can choose from the advertised and discounted phones. 

Also, the offer is only available if you sign up for AT&T's Prepaid plans, not the Postpaid ones. Prepaid plans require you to pay for your service upfront, typically on a monthly basis, before you use it. There are no contracts or credit checks, and you are in control of how much you spend. 

Here are the phones you can get for eligible plans, and how much you'd be saving against buying without the deal from AT&T:

Free phones available from $30/month prepaid plans

  • Motorola Moto G PLAY 2024 – originally $99.99 
  • AT&T Motivate Pro 5G – originally $119.99
  • Motorola moto G 5G 2023 – originally $149.99

Discounted iPhones available from $40/month Unlimited Prepaid plans

  • iPhone 11 – (discounted at $99.99, while supplies last) 
  • iPhone 12 – originally $229.99 (discounted $199.99)
  • iPhone 13 – originally $629.99 (discounted at $299.99)

Discounted Samsung Galaxy phones

  • Samsung Galaxy A14 5G – $179.99 (discounted at $39.99)
  • Samsung Galaxy A15 5G for $189.99 (discounted at $79.99).

Related: The New AT&T Guarantee Spans Its Networks, Customer Care, Deal

Head to your local AT&T store 

Enjoy these amazing offers before they’re gone on April 17. Use the store locator to find an AT&T branch near you and save yourself from unnecessary distances. If you can't make it to the stores or there aren't any closeby, don't worry. The carrier has other ongoing deals available on their website. 

There's currently a promotion where you can get the iPhone 16 Pro for free with an eligible trade-in. The Galaxy S24+ is also available for free with a trade in. Of course, terms and conditions apply, so be sure to read the fine prints.
